byline.contributor: Joshua Jamerson, Nate Schweber and Nikita Stewart contributed reporting.

abstract: Carey Gabay, lawyer for administration of New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, is caught in crossfire of shootout that police suspect to be gang-related during celebrations leading up to annual West Indian American Day parade; remains in critical condition at Kings County Hospital Center.
lead_paragraph: Carey Gabay, who was critically injured in the attack just hours before the start of the parade on Monday, was “not doing well,” Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said.

headline.main: Cuomo Administration Lawyer Is Shot in Head Before West Indian Day Parade
headline.print_headline: State Lawyer Shot in Head Before Parade in Brooklyn

snippet: Carey Gabay, who was critically injured in the attack just hours before the start of the parade on Monday, was “not doing well,” Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said.
